name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LLMan TL;DR - AI summaries for busy professionals

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered summaries for any website. Ask any question of the content and get intelligent responses. Part of the LLMan ecosystem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LLMan TL;DR provides AI-powered summaries for any website, along with chat where you can ask questions of the content and receive intelligent insights. Summaries can be saved and copied to share with others.

LLMan TL;DR is a free extension for members of the LLMan AI learning community.
